channel.title: Need help please
channel.description:
i have had my compiler deleted some how so i made a new 1 and now theres a problem O.o
starting hybridscape.no-ip.org error: cannot read: *.java 1 error exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdef founderror: server press any key to continue...[br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 03:46:41 PM[/size][hr]anyone have any ideas? or even know whats wrong? in my java folder i have: j2re1.4.2_05 jdk1.5.0_10
jre1.5.0_06 jre1.5.0_10
have i got my code right?
code: @echo off @color 1f title rickyeveritt.no-ip.info echo Starting rickyeveritt.no-ip.info "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @RickyEveritt RickyEveritt
item.description:
@RickyEveritt wrote:

i have had my compiler deleted some how so i made a new 1 and now theres a problem O.o

starting hybridscape.no-ip.org
error: cannot read: *.java
1 error
exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdef founderror: server
press any key to continue…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 03:46:41 PM[/size][hr]anyone have any ideas? or even know whats wrong?
in my java folder i have:
j2re1.4.2_05 jdk1.5.0_10

jre1.5.0_06 jre1.5.0_10

have i got my code right?

code:
@echo off
@color 1f
title rickyeveritt.no-ip.info
echo Starting rickyeveritt.no-ip.info
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server
pause
